hiveArticle.title: A Lonely Lane in the Backyard
hiveArticle.body:
It is not so late in the night still the lane becomes lonely. This is one of the few photos which I clicked using my new DSLR camera I.e. EOS 200D.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/lydgtq2re1.jpg)

Camera : Canon 200D, f4.5, 1/80, 24 mm, 12800 ISO

I really like holding the camera, it's light weight.

 ![image](https://img.esteem.ws/gprsdrha4i.jpg)
